text: Giorgi Aptsiauri (born November 20, 1994) is a Georgian rugby union player. His position is fullback or winger and he currently plays for AIA Kutaisi in the Georgia Championship and the Georgia national team.http://site.rugby.ge/en/national-team/ ==References== Category:Rugby union locks Category:Rugby union players from Georgia (country) Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Georgia international rugby union players
title: Giorgi Aptsiauri
